demo.name: brd4100a.demo.bt_ncp
demo.label: Bluetooth - NCP

model:property.value: Bluetooth - NCP
Device\ Type|NCP Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application. Runs the Bluetooth stack dynamically and provides access to it via Bluetooth API (BGAPI) using UART connection. NCP mode makes it possible to run your application on a host controller or PC.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.bt_soc_blinky
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Blinky

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Blinky
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: The classic blinky example using Bluetooth communication. Demonstrates a simple two-way data exchange over GATT. This can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.bt_soc_xg24_dev_kit_brd2601b
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC EFR32xG24 Dev Kit (BRD2601B)

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC EFR32xG24 Dev Kit (BRD2601B)
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Demonstrates the features of the EFR32xG24 Dev Kit Board. This can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd4180b.demo.bt_soc_thermometer_mock
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer (Mock)

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer (Mock)
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Implements a GATT Server with the Health Thermometer Profile, which enables a Client device to connect and get temperature data. Temperature is read from the mock relative humidity and temperature sensor.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.bt_soc_thermometer
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Implements a GATT Server with the Health Thermometer Profile, which enables a Client device to connect and get temperature data. Temperature is read from the Si7021 digital relative humidity and temperature sensor of the WSTK or of the Thunderboard.

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Implements a GATT Server with the Health Thermometer Profile, which enables a Client device to connect and get temperature data. Temperature is read from the Si7021 digital relative humidity and temperature sensor of the WSTK or of the Thunderboard.

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.bt_soc_throughput_display
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Throughput

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Throughput
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: This example tests the throughput capabilities of the device and can be used to measure throughput between 2 *EFR32* devices, as well as between a device and a smartphone using EFR Connect mobile app, through the Throughput demo tile.

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Thunderboard EFR32BG22 (BRD4184A)
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Demonstrates the features of the Thunderboard EFR32BG22 Kit. This can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.bt_soc_voice
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Voice

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Voice
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Voice over Bluetooth Low Energy sample application. It is supported by Thunderboard Sense 2 and Thunderboard EFR32BG22 boards and demonstrates how to send voice data over GATT, which is acquired from the on-board microphones.

demo.name: brd4166a.demo.bt_soc_voice
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Voice

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Voice
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Voice over Bluetooth Low Energy sample application. It is supported by Thunderboard Sense 2 and Thunderboard EFR32BG22 boards and demonstrates how to send voice data over GATT, which is acquired from the on-board microphones.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.bt_soc_ibeacon
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC iBeacon

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC iBeacon
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Sends non-connectable advertisements in iBeacon format. The iBeacon Service gives Bluetooth accessories a simple and convenient way to send iBeacons to smartphones. This example can be tested together with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd4185a.demo.bt_aoa_ncp_locator
demo.label: Bluetooth AoA - NCP locator

model:property.value: Bluetooth AoA - NCP locator
Device\ Type|NCP Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application extended with CTE Receiver support. It enables Angle of Arrival (AoA) calculation. Use this application with Direction Finding host examples.

demo.label: Bluetooth AoA - NCP locator

model:property.value: Bluetooth AoA - NCP locator
Device\ Type|NCP Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application extended with CTE Receiver support. It enables Angle of Arrival (AoA) calculation. Use this application with Direction Finding host examples.

demo.name: brd4184a.demo.bt_aoa_soc_asset_tag
demo.label: Bluetooth AoA - SoC Asset Tag

model:property.value: Bluetooth AoA - SoC Asset Tag
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.model:description: This sample app demonstrates a CTE (Constant Tone Extension) transmitter that can be used as an asset tag in a Direction Finding setup estimating Angle of Arrival (AoA).

model:property.value: Bluetooth RAIL DMP - SoC Light Micrium OS
Capability|Multiprotocol Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|RAIL

demo.model:description: This is a Dynamic Multiprotocol reference application demonstrating a light bulb that can be switched both via Bluetooth and via a Proprietary protocol. Can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app and Flex (RAIL) Switch sample app.
